column3: Mr. Brown, Mr. Iagoann, Mrs. Kroll and I were lucky enough to spend time with Mr Curry. We all enjoy a mug of hot cocoa with the Browns. #PaddingtonBear
column9: Mr. Brown, I never get upset. I just always tell myself to just sit back and let the sun go, especially on my bike.

column3: Mr. Brown, I hope you like my new film #Paddington2
column9: Mr. Brown, who is from England, said he didn't think Mr Curry would be looking forward to watching my #Paddington2 adventure but he does seem to be making some noise about it.

column3: Mr. Brown, I'm pleased we can help you to remember when #Paddington2 is released for you To find out more about my film visit: visit our 'visit site'
column9: Mr. Brown, a man of many ideas, and a baker, I didn't think Mr. Curry would be looking forward to watching my #Paddington2 adventure but I did.

column3: Mr. Brown, you have taken the most important part of my film. Where did you get it? #Paddington
column9: Mr. Brown, I hate having to lie to you but I hope someone at the Browns does manage to outdo me! #BearProblems

column3: Mr. Brown, Mr. Gruber and I are going to take a walk with him. We'll see you at 6pm on Friday.
column9: Mr. Brown, you can buy me some buns at the market today - I did but I still keep them for my garden. #bearmeals

column6: Mr. Brown, Mr. Gruber's shop is currently located in Wensdaye.
Mr. Brown, I'm going to buy some fresh marmalade!
Mr. Brown, when I was a boy I didn't think Mr Curry would be looking forward to watching my #Paddington2 adventure, but he does seem to be making some noise about it.
Mr. Brown, we want to get your #Paddington problem into our books - and to make sure it's not just a clunking down problem. We need to check a few books. #AskPaw
Mr. Brown, which was good to have you!
